# label

**Type Property**

A description of the annotation.

## Declaration

```swift
static let label: NSAccessibility.AnnotationAttributeKey
```

## Keys

- **element**: The user interface element for the annotation.
- **location**: The position where the annotation applies.

items.description: The user interface element for the annotation.
items.name: element
